name: Mardu Surge (Tarkir Dragonstorm Commander Precon Decklist)

main.name: Zurgo Stormrender
main.oracle_text:
Mobilize 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Warrior creature token. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
Whenever a creature token you control leaves the battlefield, draw a card if it was attacking. Otherwise, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Neriv, Crackling Vanguard
card.oracle_text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Neriv enters, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Whenever Neriv attacks, exile a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the number of differently named tokens you control. During any turn you attacked with a commander, you may play those cards.

card.name: Neriv, Crackling Vanguard
card.oracle_text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Neriv enters, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Whenever Neriv attacks, exile a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the number of differently named tokens you control. During any turn you attacked with a commander, you may play those cards.

card.name: Command Tower
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: Safe havens amid the desert and dragonstorms, Abzan fortresses attract merchants, travelers, outcasts, and exiles.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: Sometimes restoring the lost archives of the Jeskai can be as simple as the quiet ruffle of pages and the smell of fresh ink.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
card.flavor_text: Mardu lightning fences are the ingenious synthesis of blacksmith skill and stormsinger magic, protecting their dalkovans from even the most fearsome dragonstorms.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
—Pulan, Bant orchardist

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
card.flavor_text: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."

card.name: Fellwar Stone
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, the Pretender

card.name: Clifftop Retreat
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
card.flavor_text: The sunlight falls pristine on the temple at Epityr, softened by the remembered shadows of angelic saviors' wings.

card.name: Abrade
card.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
card.flavor_text: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"As Terisiare's mines ran dry, scrap metal became increasingly plentiful."
—*The Antiquities War*

card.name: Temple of Triumph
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Ainok Strike Leader
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you attack with this creature and/or your commander, for each opponent, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking that player.
Sacrifice this creature: Creature tokens you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: When dalkovans need protecting, all respond.

card.name: Bone Devourer
card.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
This creature enters with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creatures that died this turn.
When this creature dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Adeline, Resplendent Cathar
card.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Adeline's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever you attack, for each opponent, create a 1/1 white Human creature token that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control.

card.name: Blade of Selves
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has myriad. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token copy that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
Equip {4}

card.name: Goldlust Triad
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token copy that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Deadly Dispute
card.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
card.flavor_text: "That's a pretty ring! Trade you my knife for it."

card.name: Divine Visitation
card.oracle_text: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.
card.flavor_text: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.

card.name: Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor
card.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may pay 1 life. If they do, they draw a card.
{4}{B}{B}{B}, Discard X cards: Exile the top X cards of target opponent's library. You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Infantry Shield
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has menace and mobilize X, where X is its power. (Whenever it attacks, create X tapped and attacking 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.)
Equip {2}

card.name: Ironwill Forger
card.oracle_text: Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, target nonlegendary creature you control gains myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token copy that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

card.name: Bojuka Bog
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, exile target player's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B}.

card.name: Will of the Mardu
card.oracle_text:
Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both instead.
• Create a number of 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens equal to the number of creatures target player controls.
• Will of the Mardu deals damage to target creature equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Redoubled Stormsinger
card.oracle_text:
First strike
Whenever this creature attacks, for each creature token you control that entered this turn, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of that token. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice those tokens.
card.flavor_text: "Blink or don't. You'll get hit either way."

card.name: Within Range
card.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, create two 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens.
Whenever you attack, each opponent loses life equal to the number of creatures attacking them.

card.name: Caves of Koilos
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: After years of silence, the caves once again echo with the grisly sounds of Phyrexians preparing for war.

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{W/B}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B}.
card.flavor_text:
"Do not linger in such places, child. There the gwyllions dance. If they find you, you will join in their revels for eternity."
—Talara, elvish safewright

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Commander's Insignia
card.oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
card.flavor_text: At the general's triumphant return, renewed strength surged through the soldiers' ranks.

card.name: Beetleback Chief
card.oracle_text: When this creature enters, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
card.flavor_text: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

card.name: Shadow Summoning
card.oracle_text: Create two tapped 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
card.flavor_text:
"Beware the spirits that claim knowledge beyond the moon; beware the ritual that summons them."
—Edict of the Lunarch Council

card.name: Kaya, Geist Hunter
card.oracle_text:
+1: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature token you control.
−2: Until end of turn, if one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.
−6: Exile all cards from all graveyards, then create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card exiled this way.

card.name: Hero of Bladehold
card.oracle_text:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Whenever this creature attacks, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

card.name: Nomad Outpost
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.
card.flavor_text:
"The Mardu breathe life into what was lost under the dragonlords. If the Abzan are upset, it should be at themselves."
—Tersa Lightshatter

card.name: Emeria Angel
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
card.flavor_text: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

card.name: Grenzo, Havoc Raiser
card.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• Goad target creature that player controls.
• Exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
card.flavor_text: "You burn. I'll pillage."

card.name: Lightning Greaves
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
card.flavor_text: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

card.name: Skullclamp
card.flavor_text: Mardu blacksmiths can distill the technology of any clan and make it their own. Whether or not they should is another question.

card.name: Chittering Witch
card.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create a number of 1/1 black Rat creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Yahenni, Undying Partisan
card.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Yahenni.
Sacrifice another creature: Yahenni gains indestructible until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: "The time for subtlety is over, darling."

card.name: Myr Battlesphere
card.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, this creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

card.name: Vault of the Archangel
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}: Creatures you control gain deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
card.flavor_text:
"For centuries my creation kept this world in balance. Now only her shadow remains."
—Sorin Markov

card.name: Thalisse, Reverent Medium
card.oracle_text: At the beginning of each end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of tokens you created this turn.
card.flavor_text: She hears every voice from the swirling, whispering mist and swears to tell their stories.

card.name: Talisman of Conviction
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. This artifact deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"The sun banishes darkness every morning. I too will rise with such assuredness."
—Huatli

card.name: Stroke of Midnight
card.oracle_text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Human creature token.
card.flavor_text:
"Who was that knight, so graceful and strong? Why did she flee before the food was gone?"
—*Tale of the Masked Maiden*

card.name: Castle Ardenvale
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains.
{T}: Add {W}.
{2}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
card.flavor_text: Without Ardenvale's loyalty, the realm would greedily devour itself.

card.name: Selfless Spirit
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice this creature: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: "There is always more to give."

card.name: Castle Embereth
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain.
{T}: Add {R}.
{1}{R}{R}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: Without Embereth's courage, the realm would falter and fall.

card.name: Shattered Sanctum
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
card.flavor_text: The Quietus Cult holds their grim ceremonies in the dark places where unburied dead litter the ground.

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When this creature dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Tocasia's Welcome
card.oracle_text: Whenever one or more creatures you control with mana value 3 or less enter, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
card.flavor_text: "Your father was a dear friend to whom I owe much. He wanted me to look after you, to care for you should something happen to him."

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: Druids hold certain plants to be sacred and use their leaves and wood as a spellcasting focus.

card.name: Windbrisk Heights
card.oracle_text:
Hideaway 4 (When this land enters, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{W}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn.

card.name: Smoldering Marsh
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
card.flavor_text: The continent of Guul Draz is a geothermal swampland reeking of heat and decay.

card.name: Viscera Seer
card.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
card.flavor_text: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

card.name: Legion Warboss
card.oracle_text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn and attacks this combat if able.

card.name: Siege-Gang Commander
card.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: This creature deals 2 damage to any target.
card.flavor_text: "Ready . . . uh . . . fire!"

card.name: Loyal Apprentice
card.oracle_text:
Haste
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: Those with knowledge are wise to listen to those with imagination.

card.name: Sun Titan
card.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
card.flavor_text: A blazing sun that never sets.

card.name: Bitter Triumph
card.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or pay 3 life.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
card.flavor_text: Though he wept at Inti's death, Caparocti's eyes were keen, and his spear pierced cleanly through Clavileño's tainted heart.

card.name: Goldnight Commander
card.oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: "One faith, but many hands in victory."

card.name: Grand Crescendo
card.oracle_text: Create X 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: The roar of applause drowned out the melee raging in the lobby.

card.name: Hour of Reckoning
card.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
card.flavor_text: Those who are chosen do not doubt. Those who remain do not lament.

card.name: Idol of Oblivion
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.
{8}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.
card.flavor_text: "Arise, great one, and cleanse the world of our enemies!"

card.name: Isolated Chapel
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
card.flavor_text: Serra's blessing lies strongest upon Sursi, where her holy chapels are untouched even as the Cabal encroaches.

card.name: Legion Loyalty
card.oracle_text: Creatures you control have myriad. (Whenever a creature with myriad attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token copy that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

card.name: Ogre Battledriver
card.oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control enters, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
card.flavor_text: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

card.name: Mindblade Render
card.oracle_text: Whenever your opponents are dealt combat damage, if any of that damage was dealt by a Warrior, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
card.flavor_text: "There will be no secrets between us... like it or not."

card.name: Aron, Benalia's Ruin
card.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
card.flavor_text:
"He may look like my father, but the man I knew and loved is gone."
—Danitha

Flying, vigilance, lifelink

Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card.flavor_text: Lives taken are lives not easily forgotten.

card.name: Lingering Souls
card.oracle_text:
Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor_text: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)

Destroy X target creatures.
card.flavor_text: Open hostilities are strictly forbidden at the Inventors' Fair, but "accidents" still happen.

card.name: Twilight Drover
card.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Morbid Opportunist
card.oracle_text: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
card.flavor_text: On Innistrad, one person's windfall usually starts with another person lying face down in the mud.

card.name: Release the Dogs
card.oracle_text: Create four 1/1 white Dog creature tokens.
card.flavor_text: They charge into battle and out for their morning walk with the same exuberance.

card.name: Ophiomancer

card.flavor_text:
"There are dark, ancient arts that fascinate even me."
—Sorin Markov
